Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by San Diego in 2009...
Earned first career win on 4/20/2009...
Injured on 8/12/2009 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/22/2009, off Brian Cooper (PIT)...
Traded from San Diego to Washington on 2/4/2010 (Going to WSH: P S. Strasburg. Going to SDN: P W. Davis, P C. Volstad)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2011, going 3-0, 1.59...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 2011, going 23-6, 1.57 ERA...
Struck out 18 batters against New York (N) on 4/26/2012...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2012, going 5-0, 1.29...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2012, going 3-1, 0.35...
Injured on 10/1/2012 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Won Cy Young Award in 2012, going 18-9, 1.29 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2013, going 1-1, 0.86...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Philadelphia on 7/11/2013, striking out 8...
Traded from Washington to Texas on 2/4/2014 (Going to TEX: P S. Strasburg, SS D. Gordon, LF R. Bolden, 1B J. Morneau, P C. Capps. Going to WSH: P V. Eskew)...
Injured on 5/28/2014 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2014, going 3-0, 0.25...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Struck out 16 batters against Los Angeles (A) on 7/31/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/2014, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/14/2015, winning 2 games with a 1.15 ERA...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/2/2016 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/3/2017 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Hit first career homerun on 7/18/2019, off Lincoln Mcpeek (SDN)...
Traded from Texas to Baltimore on 2/25/2024 (Going to TEX: P J. Rodriguez, CF T. Smithey, SS J. Cribb, 2B D. Collard. Going to BAL: P S. Strasburg, P A. Delgado)...
Injured on 5/2/2024 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
